plot: The girls of Mihama Academy discover the dark past of Yūji Kazami when the terrorist Heath Oslo reappears with plans to reclaim his protege. Sachi, Amane, Michiru, Chizuru, and Yumiko must orchestrate a plan to free Yūji, who also finds himself face to face with his long lost sister Kazuki.
opening_theme: "Setsuna no Kajitsu" (刹那の果実;The Fruit of a Moment) by Maon Kurosaki
ending_theme: "Tasogare no Starlight" (黄昏のスタアライト; Starlight of Twilight) by Yoshino Nanjou (eps 1-4)
"Kimi o Sagashi ni" (きみを探しに; Looking For You) by Yoshino Nanjou (eps 6-)
